WorkItem.Description:
Hi there,
 
I need to show image files that are stored in a remote SharePoint directory in a server located across the world. My solution is being developped in VS 2010 C# .NetFramework 4.
 
I have no familiarity with SharePoint, so I do not know where to start. I plan to open the images in a browser window inside my app. I do not necessarily want to download the files, once it could be a slow process because some of them are large. If I could just show them inside a web browser window inside my app would be more than enough.
 
Thanks for any support.
 
Eduardo Quintana
WorkItem.Summary: Accessing SharePoint image files from C#

Comments.Message:
HI,

I have received no answer for a few days, and it seems no one will be helping me with this issue here.

If it is not the proper venue for getting this type of support, how could I get it? Is there any SharePoint blog or site in which I could post this question?

Thanks 

Eduardo Quintana
